name: VideoSlider
summary: VideoSlider is a custom slider with which we can show buffer position, customise slider thumb, set custom slider bar colors.
description: VideoSlider is a custom slider with which we can show buffer position, custom slider thumb, set custom slider bar colors. VideoSlider is useful for Video Apps where we need to show buffer position to the user. Also with default Slider we cannot change the slider heights which can be done with VideoSlider.
